text: to aaee usake paas donon mein se ek stree chalatee huee lajja ke saath, usane kahaah mere pita[1] aapako bula rahe hain. taaki aapako usaka paarishramik den, jo aapane paanee pilaaya hai hamaare lie. phir jab (moosa) usake paas pahuncha aur pooree katha use sunaee, to usane kahaah bhay na kar. too mukt ho gaya atyaachaaree[2] jaati se
